body.p: The Board considered the following alternatives for recognising the remeasurements component:

li.p: previous options in IAS 19 for immediate recognition (paragraph BC93).
recognition of all components in profit or loss (paragraphs BC94–BC96).
a hybrid approach requiring recognition of the remeasurements component in other comprehensive income or profit or loss in different circumstances (paragraphs BC97 and BC98).
